name: createPipelineVariableForUser
description:
Create a user level variable.
This endpoint has been deprecated, and you should use the new workspaces endpoint. For more information, see [the announcement](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/bitbucket/bitbucket-api-teams-deprecation/).

selected_user.description: Either the UUID of the account surrounded by curly-braces, for example `{account UUID}`, OR an Atlassian Account ID.

$block: Base type for most resource objects. It defines the common `type` element that identifies an object's type. It also identifies the element as Swagger's `discriminator`.

$ul: **key**: The unique name of the variable.
**secured**: If true, this variable will be treated as secured. The value will never be exposed in the logs or the REST API.
**value**: The value of the variable. If the variable is secured, this will be empty.

$block: Base type for most resource objects. It defines the common `type` element that identifies an object's type. It also identifies the element as Swagger's `discriminator`.

$ul: **data**: Optional structured data that is endpoint-specific.
